sentence: No maid service the next day had a two night stay had to asked for supplies for the bathroom like towels toilet paper and tissues
Should water really collect up to my shins when I take a shower
When sitting in the bathroom I could hear activities in the hall outside but when I was by the bed it was very quiet
Needed fridge in the room
We had a 5th floor room over looking the interior courtyard
2 weeks ago I emailed the hotel dsbosbwhiltoncom to ask about the cost for a fridge and microwave offered on request but never received a reply
Our room had a balcony overlooking the non pool side so we felt we had the best of both worlds
Housekeeping dumped out my toothbrush onto the bathroom counter when they were cleaning so that they could return the cup to the top of the fridge

This hotel was one of the first to trial the digital keys on my recent visit unfortunately after first checking in at the front desk and confirming I did not need anything I proceeded to my room only to find that the digital key did not work
We reserved a smoking room specifically and then we are told there were no smoking rooms in the hotel
Also there was no microwave in the room this would have been a plusThey have a full restaurant which serves very good meals good if you just want to stay in for the night plus a full service bar
Overlooked the pool and bar with the skylight it was fantastic

As with most Embassy Suites even number rooms are designed with balconies to face an open area that includes the pool which invites echoes from the bar area the breakfast reception area and the pool area below
Clean Large Room Breakfast Service could be a lot quicker for those not using the buffet
Got into the room with my family and low and behold no crib
It looked like the hotel was starting a number of upgrades to some rooms good planning whilst it was quite
I mean it ’s room service
After checking with room service the answer was
I am pleasantly pleased with the insulation of each room
The room was clean but pretty basic
Fridge and coffee maker
The rooms were spacious although somewhat dark in color scheme
There were loud guests one evening both hallway and adjacent room which front desk took care of and after then room was fairly quiet
There ’s a sound machine in the room and that was a definite plus
So my advice is just pick up a new room key before you head up to your room
After 4 room changes in less than 48 hours my family and I had enough
There is a refrigerator in the room and a nice TV with HBO
Started with the fact that we reserved a king bed room and were given a 2 queen bed room
I am a Diamond member so I received a room on the concierge floor with access to the lounge
We booked a king suite but the bed was queen size

The restaurant was really good but pricey the electors did n’t work the pool was in a bad spot and there was no toilet paper in my room so we went to ask house keeping she could n’t speak English and did n’t have any on here cleaning cart and just said no and continued her cleaning of another room
First the room had a very musty smell
The lady at the desk said it was too late and they can not switch my room
Upon check in I was assigned a room that was not of the room type or location that I had reserved
This makes me question how well they turn over the rooms between guests or the integrity of the staff
Bathroom sink was slow to drain
Aspirations of a night spot ruin quiet room
Not every room has a indoor balcony and no microwave
gym and smaller meeting rooms all easily accessible
Also it has been twice that I receive a pretty crappy room
